name: com.github.doqltl179.mu3libraryassets.base
description: A modular architecture framework for Unity featuring custom DI (Dependency Injection), MVP UI pattern, Audio/Scene management, WebRequest, Observable pattern, and more. Supports optional packages like UniTask, Addressables, and Localization.

samples.description: Comprehensive samples showcasing Core system, MVP pattern, Audio, WebRequest, Addressables, and Localization
ConditionalHide attribute usage examples for Inspector customization
